ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate Spews Forth... well, spews anyways
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve tried him starting at 25th level.  I usually try to smack him each time I cruise through the zone.  Unfortunately, he still kicks my ass.  He appears
ygData.messageBody:
> The player base on Fennin Ro is so large and getting to be so
> high level
> that I rarely see Gix in his place any longer.

I've tried him starting at 25th level. I usually try to smack him each time
I cruise through the zone. Unfortunately, he still kicks my ass. He
appears to resist chain and fear so much, it's scary. Hopefully, one of
these days he'll die at my hands (I think I can take him with fear + chain
now, but he has a nasty tendency of running through buildings)

A little off topic : Do you know how many level 50s there are going to be
when the alleged expansion comes? The overcrowding is going to be so out of
control. Even now, there appears to be more people above level 30 than
below level 10 at any given time. There is something not right about this,
but that's what happens when you have "capped" levels.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
